DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the pathophysiology of nephrogenic fibrosing dermopathy (NFD)/nephrogenic systemic fibrosis (NSF).
DOC.brief_title: Plasmapheresis for Nephrogenic Fibrosing Dermopathy (NFD)/Nephrogenic Systemic Fibrosis (NSF)
DOC.criteria: diagnosed with NFD/NSF following a kidney transplant diagnosed with NFD/NSF following a liver transplant NFD/NSF and who have not had a kidney or liver transplant diagnosed with NFD/NSF and who have not had a kidney or liver transplant
